verses.verse: There is <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%> to them which are in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who <S%G4043>walk<s%> not <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

For the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> has <S%G1659>made<s%> me <S%G1659>free<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> and <S%G2288>death.<s%>

For <S%G3588>what<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G102>could<s%> not do, in that it was <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3992>sending<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of <S%G266>sinful<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and for <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2632>condemned<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%>

That the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in us, who <S%G4043>walk<s%> not <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

For they that are <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> do <S%G5426>mind<s%> the things of the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> but they that are <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> the things of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
For to be <S%G4561>carnally<s%> <S%G5427>minded<s%> is <S%G2288>death;<s%> but to be <S%G3588>spiritually<s%> <S%G4151><s%> <S%G5427>minded<s%> is <S%G2222>life<s%> and <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

<S%G1360>Because<s%> the <S%G4561>carnal<s%> <S%G5427>mind<s%> is <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> for it is not <S%G5293>subject<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1063>indeed<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be.
So <S%G1161>then<s%> they that are in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But you are not in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1512>if<s%> so be that the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwell<s%> in you. <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2192>have<s%> not the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he is <S%G3756>none<s%> of his.

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be in you, the <S%G4983>body<s%> is <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G266>sin;<s%> but the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of him that <S%G1453>raised<s%> up <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3611>dwell<s%> in you, he that <S%G1453>raised<s%> up <S%G5547>Christ<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2227>quicken<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> by his <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that <S%G1774>dwells<s%> in you.
<S%G686>Therefore,<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> we are <S%G3781>debtors,<s%> not to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> to <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> you shall <S%G599>die:<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> you through the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> do <S%G2289>mortify<s%> the <S%G4234>deeds<s%> of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> you shall <S%G2198>live.<s%>
For as <S%G3745>many<s%> as are <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> they are the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For you <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1397>bondage<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G5401>fear;<s%> but you have <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5206>adoption,<s%> <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2896>cry,<s%> <S%G5>Abba,<s%> <S%G3962>Father.<s%>
The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G4828>bears<s%> <S%G4828>witness<s%> with our <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> that we are the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G2818>heirs;<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4789>joint-heirs<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G1512>if<s%> so be that we <S%G4841>suffer<s%> with him, that we may be <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4888>glorified<s%> <S%G4888>together.<s%>

For I <S%G3049>reckon<s%> that the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> are not <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be compared with the <S%G1391>glory<s%> which shall be <S%G601>revealed<s%> in us.
For the <S%G603>earnest<s%> <S%G603>expectation<s%> of the <S%G2937>creature<s%> <S%G553>waits<s%> for the <S%G602>manifestation<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For the <S%G2937>creature<s%> was <S%G5293>made<s%> <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G3153>vanity,<s%> not <S%G1635>willingly,<s%> but by <S%G1223>reason<s%> of him who has <S%G5293>subjected<s%> the same in <S%G1680>hope,<s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> the <S%G2937>creature<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> shall be <S%G1659>delivered<s%> from the <S%G1397>bondage<s%> of <S%G5356>corruption<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%> of the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For we <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G4959>groans<s%> and <S%G4944>travails<s%> in pain <S%G4944>together<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3568>now.<s%>

And not <S%G3440>only<s%> they, but ourselves <S%G2532>also,<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> the first <S%G536>fruits<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> we ourselves <S%G4727>groan<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> <S%G553>waiting<s%> for the <S%G5206>adoption,<s%> to wit, the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of our <S%G4983>body.<s%>

For we are <S%G4982>saved<s%> by <S%G1680>hope:<s%> but <S%G1680>hope<s%> that is <S%G991>seen<s%> is not <S%G1680>hope:<s%> for what a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G991>sees,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> does he yet <S%G1679>hope<s%> for?
But <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G1679>hope<s%> for that we <S%G991>see<s%> not, then do we with <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G553>wait<s%> for it.

<S%G5615>Likewise<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4878>helps<s%> our <S%G769>infirmities:<s%> for we <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G5101>what<s%> we should <S%G4336>pray<s%> for as we <S%G1163>ought:<s%> but the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G5241>makes<s%> <S%G5241>intercession<s%> for us with <S%G4726>groanings<s%> which <S%G215>cannot<s%> be <S%G215>uttered.<s%>

And he that <S%G2045>searches<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G5427>mind<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G1793>makes<s%> <S%G1793>intercession<s%> for the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the will of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And we <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G4903>work<s%> <S%G4903>together<s%> for <S%G18>good<s%> to them that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to them who are the <S%G2822>called<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G4286>purpose.<s%>

For <S%G3739>whom<s%> he did <S%G4267>foreknow,<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> did <S%G4309>predestinate<s%> to be <S%G4832>conformed<s%> to the <S%G1504>image<s%> of his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that he might be the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he did <S%G4309>predestinate,<s%> them he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2564>called:<s%> and <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2564>called,<s%> them he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1344>justified:<s%> and <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G1344>justified,<s%> them he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>
<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> to <S%G5023>these<s%> things? <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> be for us, <S%G5101>who<s%> can be <S%G2596>against<s%> us?

He that <S%G5339>spared<s%> not his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> but <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him up for us <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall he not with him <S%G2532>also<s%> freely <S%G5483>give<s%> us <S%G3956>all<s%> things?
<S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G1458>lay<s%> any thing to the <S%G1458>charge<s%> <S%G2596><s%> of <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1588>elect?<s%> It is <S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G1344>justifies.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is he that <S%G2632>comdemns?<s%> It is <S%G5547>Christ<s%> that <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G1161>yes<s%> <S%G3123>rather,<s%> that is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1453>again,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1793>makes<s%> <S%G1793>intercession<s%> for us.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G5562>separate<s%> us from the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> shall <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4730>distress,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3042>famine,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1132>nakedness,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2794>peril,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3162>sword?<s%>

As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> For your <S%G1752>sake<s%> we are <S%G2289>killed<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> long; we are <S%G3049>accounted<s%> as <S%G4263>sheep<s%> for the <S%G4967>slaughter.<s%>
<S%G235>No,<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5125>these<s%> things we are <S%G5245>more<s%> <S%G5245>than<s%> <S%G5245>conquerors<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him that <S%G25>loved<s%> us.

For I am <S%G3982>persuaded,<s%> that <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G746>principalities,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1411>powers,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> things <S%G1764>present,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> things to <S%G3195>come,<s%>

<S%G3777>Nor<s%> <S%G5313>height,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G899>depth,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2937>creature,<s%> shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5562>separate<s%> us from the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
